Usually for discounts on extra batteries, you’d have to be lucky to catch some of the rare instances of free inclusions, with occasional models getting up to 30% discounts alongside e-bike purchases, but again, these are rare occurrences. While this side sale continues you’ll be able to grab one for any XP4, XPeak, XPedition, XPress, XP Lite, ONE, and older XP 3.0 e-bikes you already own with up to $211 in savings at some of their best prices.
